## Why

What problem does this solve or what feature does it add?

## Checklist

- [ ] `npm run security:scan` passes
- [ ] `npm run check:plugin-pack` passes
- [ ] `.env.example` updated (if new config added)
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or machine-specific paths
- [ ] Tested end-to-end (if applicable)
